criterion: Provides incorrect information about the cause of itchiness on arms.
Asks the user for additional context to better understand the query.
Describes the symptoms of allergic reactions in a clear and easy-to-understand manner.
Fails to mention the possibility of other skin conditions causing itchiness.
Suggests consulting a professional for further evaluation and diagnosis.
Provides a clear and concise response without overwhelming the user with too much information.
Does not provide any information about potential triggers or allergens.
Correctly explains the difference between an allergic reaction and other skin conditions.
